Name: If You Go Down In The Woods Today
About the game: It's your first day as a park ranger, and you've been stationed in the middle of the woods. The instructions left by the previous ranger are quite concerning, including mentions of creatures that you can't outrun and buildings that will keep you safe. How long will you be able to survive your new neighbors? -- Game Play-- - Manage your health and ammo supplies as you take on an endless onslaught of merciless cryptids - Engage in all distances of combat with your trusty bolt-action rifle and hunting knife - Navigate the expansive forest to locate important supplies and new vantage points - Seek refuge in safe zones or keep moving through the woods
